channel.title: Advice for a high level account
channel.description:
[img]http://gyazo.com/6f47db7d08f7fe05f6715e0f5b351368.png?1329245183[/img]
Money: 4,641,617GP/4641K/4M.
I really don't know what I should aim for in the other levels. All I want to do for now is get 90 attack, 99 strength, 90 defence. Should I do that or work on the lower level skills?

item.title: Advice for a high level account
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:24, topic:432959”]old runescape: “holy fucking shit 70 strength! now I can do anything!”

today’s runescape: “The account is rather bad…
I’d suggest 99 strength first before anything.”

ive got an account sitting with 75 membership days just sitting because fags like this ruin the game.[/quote]
exactly

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a high level account

item.title: Advice for a high level account
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:23, topic:432959"][quote author=Aff link=topic=535679.msg3917455#msg3917455 date=1329349290]

It’s not ignorance. I just don’t want people wasting my time. Plus, I can’t be a boxer with the money I have.

you make it sound like you need a lot money to become a boxer - look at that one guy’s thread (reyx? idfk) who went from 30m to 500m - just turn your 4m into 30m and you’re set

edit: reyx’s thread where he goes from 15m to 300m + a santa

That’s your opinion, and yours only. I bet there’s hundreds that think otherwise.

hundreds out of the hundred thousand that play rs !!!

Yes he did, but he also lost them all…

if B2300 knows when to stop, he’ll be fine?
[/quote]
Nobody knows when to stop. [/quote]
probability does

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a high level account

item.title: Advice for a high level account
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:17, topic:432959"][quote author=Aff link=topic=535679.msg3916533#msg3916533 date=1329256537]
there’s hardly an incentive to train all skills because the endgame content sucks anyway
[/quote]
That’s your opinion, and yours only. I bet there’s hundreds that think otherwise.[/quote]
I think they moved their game testers to new content department lol. That’s my opinion though.

[quote=“Mod Reach”]Hi Guys,

I’m currently investigating the Right Click Disconnections so many of you are currently having.

Whilst a fix was put in place, it still seems a large quantity of you are having issues. For me to get a better idea of how many are still affected. Can you please post below with the following information about your disconnection.

  • World & Where?
  • What did you right click?
  • Screen resolution and display mode (Fixed, resizable, DirectX/OpenGL etc)

This will help me better determine the cause and the solution to the problem. All posts are automatically hidden and cannot be edited so please only make ONE POST per person and try to include all you can in the original post.

Cheers all

Reach[/quote]

Lovely new content!

[quote=“Mod Reach”]@Exp or Gtfo

I’ve just tried to kick your accounts but it appears the world you were using has gone offline.

I’ve also tried manually releasing them but it appears the server has a firm grip on you at the moment.

When a world goes down, it locks itself for about 15 minutes so after 15 mins from when it first went down, to when it releases is when you’ll be able to log back in.

Apologies for that and I’ll see what I can do about the world itself. :)[/quote]

On topic: Nice char! Train str

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a high level account

item.title: Advice for a high level account
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:14, topic:432959”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=535679.msg3916423#msg3916423 date=1329249860]

Oh yeah, if you come and post comments that are are against the account, I won’t listen to your advice Simple as that.

i said to turn it into a boxer, which is a good idea unless you want to dedicate lots of time into evening out the account. but if you want to be a dumb cunt and ignore me because i said that your account is pretty shitty (which it is), then go for it and have fun spending an unnecessary amount of time into an account that doesn’t have much potential for anything other than money making

How did you get your account good? Probably training yeah…So why couldn’t he do the same? Your logic is just retarded.

EDIT: With your logic, nobody would ever have a 138 main account.
[/quote]

there’s hardly an incentive to train all skills because the endgame content sucks anyway[/quote]
That’s your opinion, and yours only. I bet there’s hundreds that think otherwise.

Read full topic
item.source: Advice for a high level account

train your dung, you can generally train your combat skills at the sametime
